name: UMovieSceneSkeletalAnimationTrack
doc: Handles animation of skeletal mesh actors

bBlendFirstChildOfRoot: Whether to blend and adjust the first child node with animation instead of the root, this should be true for blending when the root is static, false if the animations have proper root motion
SwapRootBone: If on the root bone transform will be swapped to the specified root
bShowRootMotionTrail: Whether to show the position of the root for this sections
